channel.title: Practice Fusion System Status
channel.description: This feed shows the system status of Practice Fusion

item.title: System Update
item.description: We are investigating reported cases of slowness within the EHR. Please stay tuned here for real-time updates.

item.title: System Update
item.description: The EHR is up and running!

item.title: System Update
item.description: Upcoming System Maintenance: We're working to make improvements to your EHR! As a result, the EHR will be offline for scheduled maintenance on Tuesday 4/9 from 9PM to 1AM Pacific Time.

item.title: System Update
item.description: The EHR is up and running!

item.title: System Update
item.description: The EHR is up and running!

item.title: System Update
item.description: UPCOMING SYSTEM MAINTENANCE: Our technology team is working to make improvements to your EHR! As a result, the EHR will be offline for scheduled maintenance on Thursday 3/28 from 8PM-2AM Pacific Time.

item.title: System Update
item.description: UPCOMING SYSTEM MAINTENANCE: Our Technology Team is working to making improvements to your EHR! As a result, the EHR will be offline for scheduled maintenance on Thursday 3/28 from 8PM-2AM Pacific Time.
